flow.descriptionCdata:
3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.063073d7-1044-4c68-8b6f-8b8bba77d1b7.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.13855887-a09b-45f5-86a4-39bee4e92922.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.1752a55f-f976-4867-9f1c-f2379923172b.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.1bf85b9b-0207-4e10-a84d-71a83eef0337.prompt=User Identifier 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.298c4931-0c2c-4f2c-b4e2-dbf55da6953c.description=
This workflow adds/updates the service component property using Artifact API.

Inputs-
componentId – Service Component  id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
propertyName – Property Name to add or update
onlyUpdate\: yes/no 
yes - To update values of existing property (In this case input "valueType" is not required , This input will not be considered even if provided)
no - To add/update property
valueType - Value type of the property. It can have value from selection list "HP CSA – Property ValueType". This Input is required only when Input "onlyUpdate" is selected as "no".
values - One or more values delimited by comma , (If user want to use some other separator for multiple values then needs to be pass as next input "separator")
separator - A delimiter that separates elements in the values ( default delimiter used is comma ,)
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
document  – returned XML document from API
3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.68b2aed8-e536-4140-ad8c-4327d4348818.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.6b0a5fec-92b6-45ae-a4f5-7408ed4d0bd7.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.71cad8b9-93a9-42d5-8ace-d703e5724539.prompt=Enter a value for keystore 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.79e7a728-2894-4ec0-b1b3-b4c17a281609.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.7d0cf4f6-7492-4310-94b1-5ad5444b5d17.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.9c1ca280-deac-4e4c-bf65-950139e978e1.description=
Sleeps for the number of seconds specified in the input.

Inputs\:
seconds - The number of seconds to sleep.

Responses\:
success - Slept for the number of seconds given as input.
failure - Was unable to sleep for some reason.
3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.ae1860f5-ae1a-45a2-bb3e-48d0b13cce72.prompt=Enter a value for timeout 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.bd56e647-523f-41c1-a961-a0a5cf91524f.prompt=Enter a value for authType 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.c13947c8-b46d-461a-925b-a899ef23db47.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.c2fd11db-931f-42c5-aa84-ab94baf87d64.prompt=Enter a value for proxy 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.d65dbc54-ad09-44e8-92b2-86e4fe06a914.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.dd619db2-7ddb-45cc-aed9-1b9be8ce7d01.prompt=Component ID 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.description=
This workflow denies the Change request ticket in Service Manager. This flow is invoked by SM using MACROS using the flow UUID.

Inputs\:

ticketId 		\: Change request ticket Id

Responses\:
success 		\: Workflow completed successfully.
failure 		\: Something went wrong.
3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.ec341866-f5a1-4049-beba-f084f2ac9730.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.eeb79704-3ab9-4853-a4a9-430d39a96519.prompt=ID 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.f4532223-3a2d-4fa8-a045-6c46a4cc09c6.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername 3dd9d95a-b7a4-44a2-a6eb-273ba71292ee.fca3a0ec-753c-4f9c-8343-70c89b17b629.description=
Retrieves a change ticket's details

Inputs\:
host - The DNS name or IP Address of your Service Manager host
port - The port to connect to your Service Manager host on.
protocol - The protocol to connect to your Service Manager host with. Either HTTP or HTTPS.
username - The username for the Service Manager host.
password - The password for the Service Manager user.
smVersion - Version of Service Manager. If the given value is empty or contains only spaces the default version 'sm700' will be used.
id - ID of the change

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
smMessage - Service Manager request brief message
smMessages - Service manager request additional messages
smReturnCode - Service Manager request's return code
smStatus - Service Manager request return status
id - ID of the change
actualCost - Actual cost
approvalStatus - Ticket approval status
assets - Assets (sometimes interchangeable with Configuration Item)
assignee - Assignee's name
assignmentGroup - Primary assignment group
briefDescription - Brief description (single line)
category - Ticket category
closedTime - Time of ticket closure
configItem - Configuration item (sometimes interchangeable with Configuration Item)
contact - Contact name
coordinator - Coordinator
description - Ticket description (long)
estimateDescription - Cost estimate description
estimatePrice - Cost estimate
initialImpact - Initial impact
journalUpdates - Update history (new-line delimited)
location - Location
misc1 - Miscellaneous info (single line)
misc2 - Miscellaneous info (single line)
misc3 - Miscellaneous info (single line)
open - Ticket open status
openTime - Time ticket was last opened
plannedEndDate - Planned end date/time
plannedStartDate - Planned start date/time
priority - Ticket priority
reason - Reason for rejection
requestedBy - Ticket requester
requestedEndDate - Requested end date by initiator
service - Affected service with ticket
severity - Severity (sometimes called User Priority)
subCategory - Subcategory / area
scheduledOutageStart - Scheduled outage start date/time
scheduledOutageEnd - Scheduled outage end date/time
flow.name: SM Deny Ticket
